itunes:title: EPISODE 276: Has America Broken Into Two Societies?
title: EPISODE 276: Has America Broken Into Two Societies?
description:
WARNING: According to President Joe Biden, Giorgia Meloni’s victory in Italy could threaten American democracy; however, Jack quickly proves Biden to be much more tyrannical and anti-democratic than Meloni. Posobiec analyzes the two reactions in America to Lizzo playing James Madison’s 200-year-old flute while twerking in a skimpy outfit on stage. The Sussex Police Department in the U.K. defended a transgender serial pedophile, saying they don’t tolerate ‘hate’ towards gender identity as it’s irrelevant to the crime. Finally, a win! Oklahoma Children’s Hospital stopped performing ‘certain gender services for minors’ after the legislature threatened to withhold funding unless changes were made. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


To get 20% off the 3-month supply of ‘My Patriot Supply’ when you go to PrepareWithPOSO.com, no promo code required
content:encoded:
WARNING: According to President Joe Biden, Giorgia Meloni’s victory in Italy could threaten American democracy; however, Jack quickly proves Biden to be much more tyrannical and anti-democratic than Meloni. Posobiec analyzes the two reactions in America to Lizzo playing James Madison’s 200-year-old flute while twerking in a skimpy outfit on stage.
